column4: hello, how do i install the new thunderbird 2.0 without it being in the repos?
since its not part of the base system... ...

you can make sure ubuntu "mozilla-thunderbird" / "thunderbird" is NOT installed, and  use mozilla's thunderbird package...  you would need to link /usr/local/bin/thunderbird there  for it to be executable as "thunderbird" by other user.s...
